item.title: Trafik源代码阅读
item.description: Trafik介绍 其官网是这么介绍的： Træfɪk is a modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer made to deploy microservices with ease. It supports several backends (Docker, Swarm, Mesos/Marathon, Consul, Etcd, Zookeeper, BoltDB, Rest API, file...) to manage its configuration automatically and dynamically. 翻译过来就是：Træ
